response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to you, just as it does to us. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000, a generous discount that reflects our commitment to making such extraordinary quality accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Thank you for considering our proposal, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 950000}
